CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1957, pg. A13, reads: "Modern Dancers at YWCA - The YWCA will celebrate its traditional week, April 21-28, in more than 1,900 communities. Following in growth and progress of the 'Y' and its activities, are many new classes.  Outstanding is one in the modern dance taught by Betty Love, a graduate of Penn State, and a student of the famous Martha Graham.  Pictured are Helen Van Geem, Theresa H. Weaver, and Miss Love. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dancers Helen Van Geem holding drum, and Theresa H. Weaver and Betty Love, wearing leotards and leaping in modern dance class, YWCA
